title.rendered: JOB POST: Scientific Assistant in STQC at NIELIT [Level-6 Scale of Pay; Rs.35K to 1.1L Per Month]: Apply by March 18!

content.rendered:
Applications are invited for the post of Scientific Assistant in Standardization Testing & Quality Certification Directorate (STQC) at NIELIT. Vacancies to be filled up on Direct Recruitment Basis and the application deadline is March 18, 2025!

About NIELIT

The National Institute of Electronics & Information Technology (NIELIT), an autonomous society under the Ministry of Electronics & IT (MeitY), Government of India, focuses on Human Resource Development in Information, Electronics & Communications Technology (IECT). It offers both formal and non-formal education, industry-oriented training, and certification programs in IT.

With 47 centers across India and 700+ affiliated institutes, NIELIT provides diverse courses, including O, A, B, and C levels, CCC, BCC, and specialized training in Information Security, ITeS-BPO, Bioinformatics, Embedded Systems, and M.Tech programs. It also undertakes R&D, consultancy, software development, and national projects, such as the National Population Register (NPR) and Agriculture Census. NIELIT aims to become an Institute of National Importance through innovation and digital transformation.

Job Details

On behalf of the Standardization Testing & Quality Certification (STQC) Directorate, an attached office of the Ministry of Electronics & Information Technology (MeitY), applications are invited from eligible and qualified candidates for the post of Scientific Assistant in STQC.

The detailed advertisement, including application procedures, is available on the following websites:

  • NIELIT Recruitment Portal
  • MeitY Official Website
  • STQC Official Website
  • NIELIT Official Website

Candidates must meet the eligibility criteria, including educational qualifications and experience (if applicable), as specified in the official notification. The qualifications must be obtained from a recognized university or institution established under the Central or State Government or recognized under the UGC Act.

All eligibility requirements must be fulfilled by the last date of application submission, which is March 18, 2025. The essential qualifications, experience requirements, upper age limit, and pay scale for the position are detailed in the official advertisement.

Qualifications

B.E. / B.Tech / M.Sc. in any one or in combination of following: Electronics / Electronics & Communications / Electronics & Telecommunications / Computer Science/ Computer & Networking Security / Software system / Information Technology / Electrical / Informatics

Responsibilities

  • Research & Development (R&D):
    • Contributing to scientific and technical research in emerging technologies.
    • Assisting in developing software, hardware, and embedded systems.
  • Software & IT System Development:
    • Developing, testing, and maintaining software applications and IT solutions.
    • Assisting in cloud computing, cybersecurity, and networking projects.
  • Network Administration & Cybersecurity:
    • Managing network infrastructure, troubleshooting, and ensuring security.
    • Implementing cybersecurity policies and handling data protection.
  • Electronics & Communication System Management:
    • Working on embedded systems, IoT, and signal processing projects.
    • Assisting in electronic hardware design and testing.
  • Technical Support & System Maintenance:
    • Providing technical support for government IT initiatives.
    • Maintaining and upgrading existing IT and electronics infrastructure.
  • Training & Capacity Building:
    • Assisting in training programs for students, professionals, and government employees.
    • Developing study materials and conducting workshops on various technical topics.
  • Data Analysis & AI/ML Implementation:
    • Working on AI, ML, and Data Science projects.
    • Developing and managing AI-driven applications for government projects.
  • Project Management & Documentation:
    • Assisting in the execution of government projects related to IT and electronics.
    • Preparing reports, technical documents, and project documentation.
  • Collaboration & Innovation:
    • Collaborating with industry partners, academia, and research organizations.
    • Contributing to innovative solutions in digital governance and IT services.
  • Compliance & Policy Implementation:
    • Ensuring compliance with government IT and electronics policies.
    • Assisting in the implementation of standards for data security and software development.

Choice of Center For Written Examinations

Candidates shall indicate their choice for Centre for Written Examination from the cities listed below. No change of Centre will be permissible at a later date. NIELIT, however, reserves the right to direct the candidate to appear for Written Test at any location irrespective of his indicated choice depending upon the number of applications received and the administrative convenience.
Agartala, Bangalore, Calicut, Chandigarh 5) Chennai 6) Delhi 7) Guwahati 8) Hyderabad 9) Jaipur 10) Jammu 11) Kolkata (12) Lucknow (13) Mumbai 14) Patna.

Application Guidelines

  • Interested Applicants are suggested to apply from here
  • The application shall be treated complete only if all the mandatory Steps are completed successfully. In case candidate is not able to submit fee by closing date and time, or the application is otherwise incomplete, his/her candidature will summarily be rejected.
  • Applicant can view the Application details from the View/Print Application menu option available in their login. Applicant is required to make sure that „Application Status‟ on application form is “Submitted successfully” otherwise application will be treated as incomplete and summarily rejected.

Application Fee

  • Application Fee Payment: Candidates must pay the application fee through online payment mode via the application software only.
  • Fee Structure:
    • SC/ST/PwBD/Women Candidates: No fee (NIL)
    • General and All Other Candidates: ₹800 per application
  • Additional Charges: Processing charges for remittance and any applicable service tax must be borne by the candidate.
  • Payment Mode Restrictions: Fees will not be accepted through Demand Draft, Pay Order, Cheque, or Challan.

Salary

Level – 6, Rs. 35k – 1.1L.

Selection Process

Written Test (Objective Type) only.

No. of Posts

  • Total =78
  • UR = 13
  • EWS = 20
  • SC = 16
  • ST = 03
  • OBC = 26

How to Apply?

Interested applicants can apply through this link.

Deadline

The last date of receipt of applications is March 18, 2025.
